data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Ilam with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ilam, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Ilam who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ilam, Iran.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,023 believers find a person of peace today among the 577,177 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bakhtiari people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who are far from you in Ilam. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ilam you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 3,023 believers in Ilam and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
